alert.note: Alert for Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 12:52AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact southwest Wisconsin through 115 AM CDT... At 1250 AM CDT, automated stations reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Tomah to near Boscobel to near Colesburg. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Automated weather observations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Tomah around 1255 AM CDT. Muscoda around 105 AM CDT. Necedah around 110 AM CDT. Dickeyville around 115 AM CDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 between mile markers 137 and 147. Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 46 and 80. Interstate 90 in Wisconsin between mile markers 36 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
